knimeNode.name: RowID
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to replace the row ID and/or to create a column with the values of the current row IDs.

intro.p: This node can be used to replace the row ID of the input data with the values of another column (by converting the values to String). The user has additional options to ensure the uniqueness and to handle missing values.
It can also be used to create a new column which contains the row ID as value.
If both options are selected the node appends a new column with the current row ID values to the table and replaces the row key with the values of the selected column.
Notice: Highlighting doesn't work across this node.

ports.dataOut: Data with the row ID values as column and/or a new row IDs
